sentences.sContent: We beseech thee to come eat dinner with us.
sentences.sContent_eng: We beseech thee to come eat dinner with us.
sentences.sCn: 我们恳求你来和我们一起吃晚饭。

sentences.sContent: After a nap, television entertains the apprentices until they eat dinner and retire.
sentences.sContent_eng: After a nap, television entertains the apprentices until they eat dinner and retire.
sentences.sCn: 在小睡之后，新手们会一直看电视直到吃晚饭和就寝。

sentences.sContent: Or they can eat dinner and listen to live music at the Mangy Moose Saloon.
sentences.sContent_eng: Or they can eat dinner and listen to live music at the Mangy Moose Saloon.
sentences.sCn: 或者，他们可以在梅吉.穆斯沙龙吃晚餐，并聆听现场音乐会。
